pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gene Expression Datasets for the 'MM2S' Package // Gene Expression datasets for the 'MM2S' package. Contains normalized expression data for Human Medulloblastoma ('GSE37418') as well as Mouse Medulloblastoma models ('GSE36594'). Deena Gendoo et al. (2015) doi:10.1016/j.ygeno.2015.05.002.
